text: Vera Miles (born August 23, 1929) is an American actress. She worked closely with Alfred Hitchcock. She is known for her role as Lila Crane in the classic masterpiece Psycho, and in the sequel Psycho II. Her other popular movie include The Wrong Man, The Searchers, Follow Me Boys! and The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance. ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Oklahoma
title: Vera Miles
